column4: x crashed while I was playing a movie with VLC and now whenever I try to open a directory from my netbook remix desktop, it tries to open it with VLC.
i think you can change the default option to open the directory
just right click and properties.. i think it should be somewhere there
it works fine in nautilus, but in the files and folders tab it tries to use VLC. Right-clicking on the icons there only yields an open option.
